about_the_game:
This is a medieval fantasy-style tower defense strategy game. Players will take on the role of the kingdom's defender, protecting the main castle from being destroyed by the goblin army. The only resource consumed in the game is the player's cursor operation time. Players can directly kill goblins with the cursor or build and upgrade defense towers.

Building defense towers with different functions strategically can make the player's defense line stronger, and by combining this with the cursor-based enemy-killing mechanism, it can effectively defend against the increasingly powerful attacks of the goblin army.

Right-click the mouse to eliminate goblins

Defend against the goblin army's attack and wield your cursor! Fight for the protection of the kingdom!!!!

Build and upgrade defense towers

The game features a variety of defense towers with different functions. Players can build and upgrade them through cursor operations, and they can also unlock new defense towers by upgrading the main castle of the kingdom.

A variety of defense towers and free layout operations offer more strategies for annihilating the goblin army and defending the kingdom's castle.

The goblin army's attack

In the game, various types of goblins will appear, and the intensity of the goblin army's attacks will increase over time.

The goblin army will launch attacks from all directions, and players must strengthen their defense lines as much as possible to protect the main castle of the kingdom from the goblin army's onslaught. Go for it! Defenders of the kingdom!

Game Features

🌟 Simple operation, all actions can be completed with just the cursor, the faster your hand speed, the more efficient the resource utilization.

🌟 A variety of defense towers can be combined for use, creating a highly strategic tower defense mechanism, with non-stop brain storming.

🌟 Goblins with different characteristics form a powerful goblin army, launching attacks in waves, hold on, we can win!

Are you ready, defender of the kingdom? The goblin army has arrived at the border of the kingdom. Bring out your courage and conviction, let's fight together!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5+ / AMD Ryzen5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7+ / AMD Ryzen7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Cursor Kingdom" is a medieval fantasy-style tower defense strategy game. Plan and use your cursor resources wisely to build defenses and repel the invading goblin hordes, protecting your kingdom!
